Name: PowerPoint
Feature_1: color schemes for presentations, ability to change color scheme retrospectively,

Name: PowerPoint
Feature_1: designed exclusively for the new Windows 3.1 platform
Feature_2: full support for TrueType fonts (new in Windows 3.1)
Feature_6: new drawing, including freeform tool, autoshapes, flip, rotate, scale, align, and transforming imported images
Feature_7: transitions between slides in slide show

Name: PowerPoint XP
Feature_4: use of Exchange and SharePoint for storage and collaboration.

Name: PowerPoint 2003
Feature_1: tools visible to presenter during slide show
Feature_6: "Package for CD" to write presentation and viewer app to CD.  was a free plug-in from Microsoft

Name: PowerPoint 2007
Feature_1: new user interface ("Office Fluent") employing a changeable "ribbon" of tools across the top to replace menus and toolbars
Feature_4: many graphical improvements in text and drawing

Name: PowerPoint 2010
Feature_9: enhanced editing for video and for pictures

Name: PowerPoint 2013
Feature_1: Change default slide shape to 16:9 aspect ratio
Feature_4: user interface redesigned for multi-touch screens

Name: PowerPoint 2016
Feature_1: "Tell me" to search for program controls
Feature_6: "Zoom" to slides or sections in slideshow
Feature_7: "Presentation Translator" for real-time translation of a presenter's spoken words to on-screen captions in any of 60+ languages
